original: 廣陵人，東吳宗室孫奇之妻，范慎之女。二宮之爭，因孫奇為魯王孫霸黨羽，而被孫權問罪誅殺。范慎欲將女兒改嫁，范姬不允，自割耳鼻毀容以明志。
text: People from Guangling, wife of Sun Qi, daughter of Fan Shen. In the Second Palace Controversy, Sun Qi was punishable by Sun Quan because he was a member of King Lu and Sun Ba. Fan Shen wanted to remarry her daughter, but Fan Ji refused to allow her to cut her ears and nose and disfigured her face.
